template.name: basicconfig
template.value:
spring: application: name: $END$
nexmo: monitoring: service-name: ${spring.application.name}
management: endpoints: web: exposure: include: prometheus,metrics,health,stats,info,env,loggers,beans
logging: level: com.nexmo: 'DEBUG' pattern: console: '%d{HH:mm:ss.SSS} %5p [%t] %-35.35logger{35} [%X{traceId}]: %m%n'
